title: 2-on-1 Business Trip Massage 2
overview: Hyeon-ji quits her job and decides to start a business trip massage store where she can earn a lot of money. She makes a proposal to her friend Mi-na to join her business. At the same time, So-hee, who had a hard time working alone, decided to join the two and work together. Then one day, Seung-mo calls Hyeon-goo, who is looking for a new store, and says that there is a store that offers a 2-on-1 massage.
